Title: Provides that persons with a medically diagnosed developmental disability shall be eligible to receive a fishing license free of charge
Summary: Provides that persons with a medically diagnosed developmental disability shall be eligible to receive a fishing license free of charge and shall not be required to pay a fee.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-0715, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to providing for persons with a medically diagnosed developmental disability to be eligible to receive a fishing license free of charge
